entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is introduced as someone who had squeezed in through the door.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is described as wearing a tasselled velvet hat and smoking jacket.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as someone who is being led into the party by Slughorn.

entities.name: eldred worple
entities.description: Eldred Worple is described as an old student of Slughorn's and author of a book.

entities.name: sanguini
entities.description: Sanguini is introduced as a vampire who is standing at the party.

relationships.description: Slughorn led Harry into the party.
Harry dragged Luna along with him into the party.
Slughorn introduced Harry to Eldred Worple.
